# 1993 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 1993 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 1994 for the 1993 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 1993 are as follows.
